    About Me,

    I'm Eric Michaels:

    Visual Artist | Designer

    All Day. Everyday.

    I receieved my Bachelors of Fine Arts Degree from Otis College of Art and
    Design with an emphasis in Sculpture and New Genres, while also acquiring
    a minor in Creative Writing. Prior to my studies at Otis, I receieved my
    Associates of Arts degree in Graphic Design from the Art Institute of
    California - Los Angeles and continue to base my practice in Los Angeles.
